snippet.title: Devil's Hunt - Destroyer Trailer [Switch Announcement]
snippet.description:
Demon punching simulator is coming out on September 17! You will also be able to indulge in your demon punching fantasies on the go with Nintendo Switch version coming next year!

Wishlist the game on Steam now:

http://bit.ly/Devils_Hunt_Steam

The war between Demons and Angels takes you to hell and back in this third person action game. You are Desmond, the one man with demonic powers who can decide the fate of our world by joining either side of the conflict.

Release date: September 17th on PC
Platforms: PC, XBOX One, PS4 and Nintendo Switch

Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company

#DevilsHunt #HacknSlash #ActionGame
